title: need help
body:
I sent a discussion on the board eariler today but ´´riot games`` removed it. I just hope that i can send this one without riot removing my message.

I have some major problems and i really need help.
Firstly i just want to know if it is possible to change region even if someone hijacked your account? 

For example. EU West to Russia.  Is it possible for riot employe to change the region on that account back to EU west?

replies.body: I'm not entirely sure what you're asking. Was your account compromised? If so, have you reached out to our account recovery team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) already?
